description: Archon UI Component Reference for AI Agents and Developers

navigation.description: Navigation components for app and page-level navigation

components.name: MainNavigation
components.usage: Fixed left sidebar navigation with glassmorphism, tooltips, and active state indicators
components.example: Fixed position, icon-based, tooltip on hover, neon glow on active

components.name: PageTabs
components.usage: Top-level page navigation tabs (e.g., Docs/Tasks in Projects)

components.name: ViewToggleButtons
components.usage: Toggle between grid and table views
components.example: Grid/List icon buttons with active state styling

components.name: CardGridLayout
components.usage: Horizontal scrolling card grid for project cards or similar items

components.name: SidebarListLayout
components.usage: Sidebar navigation list with compact cards and search
components.pattern: Fixed left column (w-72) with vertical list, Input for search, main content on right (flex-1)
components.example: Projects page sidebar variant - vertical list with smaller cards

components.name: BentoGridLayout
components.usage: Two-column responsive grid for collapsible settings cards

components.name: ResponsiveGridLayout
components.usage: Responsive grid for card items (1/2/3/4 columns)
components.pattern: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-4

components.name: TableLayout
components.usage: Table with glassmorphism styling, hover states, and action buttons

cards.description: Card components for various use cases

components.name: ProjectCard
components.usage: Card with real-time data (task counts), selection states, pinned indicator

components.name: CollapsibleSettingsCard
components.usage: Collapsible card with PowerButton toggle and flicker animation

components.name: GlassCard (Primitive)
components.usage: Base glassmorphism card with configurable blur, transparency, tints, edges

components.name: DocumentBrowser
components.usage: Modal for displaying documents, code, logs, or structured information with tabs and search
components.pattern: Dialog + Tabs + Search input + Collapsible items with expand/collapse
components.example: Knowledge inspector, document viewer, code browser, log viewer

components.name: Button (Primitive)
components.usage: Base button with glassmorphism variants

radix_primitives.description: Radix UI primitives with Archon glassmorphism styling

components.name: Tabs
components.usage: Tab navigation with color variants and neon glow effects

components.name: Select
components.usage: Dropdown select with glassmorphism and color variants
components.example: Configurators use Select for all dropdowns

components.name: Dialog
components.usage: Modal dialogs with glassmorphism backdrop

components.name: Checkbox
components.usage: Styled checkbox with color variants

components.name: Switch
components.usage: Toggle switch with smooth animations

components.name: Tooltip
components.usage: Hover tooltips with glassmorphism

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.usage: Context menus with glassmorphism

components.name: ToggleGroup
components.usage: Mutually exclusive button group
